full_threads.body:
Fantastic, thanks for fixing that so quickly, Rica!

Kind Regards,​

Remona Mekdessi Sarkis

Senior Supervising Speech Pathologist (CPSP) - Hills District Speech Therapy

Website: http://www.hdspeechtherapy.com.au/

Email: remona@hdspeechtherapy.com.au

Phone: (02) 9054 1996

Contact Days & Times: Wednesday & Friday (8.30am - 4.30pm)

Social Media: @hdspeechtherapy

CANCELLATION POLICY: All appointments at HDST are made in advance and therefore reserved to meet your specific requirements and preferences. Cancellation fees do apply. Please see our cancellation policy for more information:https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/faqs/cancellation-policy/

We acknowledge the Traditional Owners of the land on which we provide our services, and pay respect to the spiritual, physical and cultural connection they have with their country and to their Elders past, present and emerging.

Any confidentiality or privilege is not waived or lost because this email has been sent to you by mistake. Please immediately contact the sender if you have received it in error.

❗Please keep updated with our COVID-19 Safety Response by visiting: https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/covid-19/



🎄Merry Christmas & Happy New Year from the HDST Team

HDST will be closed from the 23rd of December 2021 and re-open on the 10th of January 2022.

Please contact me to secure your bookings for 2022.

For activities you can complete over the holiday break, click on the image!

Hope you had a lovely weekend. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here's the new link:

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

Thank you for your email. I'm sorry but the external referral page is a new page that needs to be accessible from the new clients tab. Could you please reinstate the old form and link to the page and create a new page with this new form?

Kind regards,

Remona Mekdessi Sarkis
Speech Pathologist (MSLP CPSP)
Hills District Speech Therapy

Hi Remona, 

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link: 
https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/new-clients/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

ID0EC
Begin forwarded message:
From: Remona Mekdessi <remona@hdspeechtherapy.com.au>
Subject: New form required - HDST Website
Date: 11 February 2022 at 10:38:40 am AEDT
To: Heath Maguire - Wolf IQ <heath@wolfiq.com.au>

Hi Heath,

I hope this email finds you well.

We are in need of another form to add to our 'new clients' tab. Details are below. Thanks!

*'new client' >> 'EXTERNAL REFERRER

Page: please set up similar to https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/new-paediatric-clients/

NEW Paediatric Therapy Booking Enquiries for External Referrers

Intake at Hills District Speech Therapy is completed by a senior speech pathologist or intake officer. We understand you will have many questions and we will happily guide you through the whole process with the aim of booking you in with the most suitable speech therapist for your requirements. Please use the form below which will assist us in this process. We will wait await contact from the client's family in order to proceed with any bookings.

Questions to include on form:

Referrer's details

Name

Position

Location

Client's name

Client's age

Family contact name

Family contact no.

  • Tick that they have instructed family to call to make booking

*booking will not go ahead until family have made contact* *please ensure the family specify that they need to be seen offsite at your location*

Reason for referral

Goals for client

Assessments completed by school y/n, if yes, details

Reports available? Y/N

Will this family want to be seen at your location? y/n

Kind Regards,​

Remona Mekdessi Sarkis

Senior Supervising Speech Pathologist (CPSP) - Hills District Speech Therapy

Website: www.hdspeechtherapy.com.au

Email: remona@hdspeechtherapy.com.au

Phone: (02) 9054 1996

Contact Days & Times: Wednesday & Friday (8.30am - 4.30pm)

Social Media: @hdspeechtherapy

CANCELLATION POLICY: All appointments at HDST are made in advance and therefore reserved to meet your specific requirements and preferences. Cancellation fees do apply. Please see our cancellation policy for more information:https://hdspeechtherapy.com.au/faqs/cancellation-policy/

We acknowledge the Traditional Owners of the land on which we provide our services, and pay respect to the spiritual, physical and cultural connection they have with their country and to their Elders past, present and emerging.
